document_data.mainbody:
Funglesby was a fighter-thug and an Envoy of Stone Lord, who opposed the The Guild crime gang of Baldurs Gate in the late 15 century DR.
Funglesby had a crimson skin tone of a tiefling with the taint of Asmodeus running through his veins. He had shortly-cropped brown hair and black horns. Funglesby worse a set of heavy armor and was armed with an enchanted hammer â€“ Corpsegrinder.
In the , during the Absolute crisis, Farlin led a gang of Guild members in dealing with the Stone Lord and his men. The new kingpin secretly served the Absolute and was trying to remove the Guilds influence from across the Gate. Farlins group faced a band of the Stone Lords men led by Cairos, who served as Stone Lords envoy. In his foul attitude and arrogance, Funglesby would not believe that Minsc of Rashemen was Stone Lord even if he confronted the tiefling directly. The groups clashed under the Wyrms Crossing bridge in Rivington over a shipment of supplies. However, the meeting devolved into a battle and either of squadss fate remained uncertain.
